scripts.scss: node-sass --output-style compressed --sourceMap sources/scss -o docs/assets/styles sources/scss && postcss -u autoprefixer -r docs/assets/styles/*
scripts.watch:all: parallelshell "npm run pug:watch" "npm run babel:watch" "npm run scss:watch" "npm run serve"
scripts.build:all: parallelshell "npm run pug" "npm run scss" "npm run babel"
scripts.start: npm run build:all && npm run watch:all
